td.content: s:patient presents with severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason for 7 weeks. patient also reports severe taking no pleasure in doing activities and has not appetite for food and feels worthless and guilty, severe thoughts of death frequently but denies suicidal thoughts, Mental Health. she is a 48 yo white F secretary general. o:Height 67 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

content2.Unmatched: patient also reports severe taking no pleasure

td.content: s:a 48 yr old white F secretary general complains of severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason, severe thoughts of death frequently but denies suicidal thoughts, severe taking no pleasure in doing activities and has not appetite for food and feels worthless and guilty and Mental Health and other medical problems. NKDA. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 67 in, Weight 139 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Urine toxicology.

s:a F secretary general aged 49 years with C/O moderate feelings of loneliness and isolation for 11 days that is frequent. patient also reports moderate persistent unhappiness with life for the past several years. Denies ever using tobacco drinks daily o:Height 67 in, Weight 139 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 17 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate persistent unhappiness with life for the past several years and moderate feelings of loneliness and isolation. she is a white female aged 49 ys. o:Height 67 in, Weight 139 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed buproprion SR - 300 mg /day.
